ygData.subject: Re: Fletching guide
ygData.msgSnippet: Most all merchants that sell the things to make arrows sell the fletching book and most that sell supplies for bows sell the bowery book. For fletching the guy
ygData.messageBody:
Most all merchants that sell the things to make
arrows sell the fletching book and most that sell
supplies for bows sell the bowery book. For fletching the
guy you bought the supplies from in Surefall should
have the book and the woman merchant in the ranger
guild house in Surefall that sells bow stuff has the
book for bows and yes having the book is essential and
have it open when you do you
fletching.<br><br>Keban<br>Master Fletcher<br>Ranger of Surefall Glade <br>18th
Season on Brell
